subject: Career
title: Networking Events: The Real Strategy
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Networking Events: The Real Strategy.

hook.text: He went to 50 networking events. Collected 200 cards. Made zero meaningful connections. What went wrong?

buildup.text: Most people at networking events broadcast: 'Here's what I do.' Nobody listens because everyone's broadcasting.

discovery.text: The strategy: ask questions, listen deeply, and follow up within 48 hours with a personalized note.

twist.text: One genuine conversation beats twenty handshakes. Depth trumps breadth at events.

climax.text: Arrive with a goal: 'I want to have three real conversations.' Then leave. Quality over time spent.

quiz.question: What's the most effective strategy at networking events?
options: Have a few deep conversations and follow up within 48 hours
Collect as many business cards as possible
